constraint.description: Maps all warnings of the NexusIQ report to jQA minor warnings.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (a:Action)<-[:DEFINES_ACTION]-(pa:PolicyAlert)-[:HAS_TRIGGER]->(t:Trigger)-[:HAS_COMPONENT_FACT]-(compF:ComponentFact)-[:HAS_CONSTRAINT_FACT]->(consF:ConstraintFact)-[:HAS_CONDITION_FACT]->(condF:ConditionFact) WHERE a.actionTypeId = "warn" RETURN compF.displayName as Artifact, consF.constraintName as Constraint, condF.reason as Reason
